metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9114 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a NULL Pointer Access in function imagetopnm of convert.c:1943(jp2) of OpenJPEG 2.1.2. image->comps[compno].data is not assigned a value after initialization(NULL). Impact is Denial of Service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-9114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjp2-7 - 2.2.0-1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.2.0-1
libopenjp3d-tools - 2.2.0-1
libopenjp3d7 - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip-server - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.2.0-1
libopenjpip7 - 2.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-1').
